short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes any previously opened tabs with the same URL as current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you often find yourself opening the same tabs over and over through the day and you end up with multiple windows filled with tabs?

This extension will automatically close any tabs that have the same URL as the window that you're currently using or opening in the background.

*** This is currently alpha and probably has bugs! Also new features will be added. Some currently being hashed out are a whitelist for URLs you don't want closed and an options page that allows for more control over which tabs close. Currently this suits my purposes but it may not suit everyone! ***

This extension does require permissions to be able to view all of your tabs. You'll see very ominous permission warnings about this extension being able to view your data on all websites and access your tabs and browsing history. This data goes nowhere and the current version of the code can be inspected at the website URL listed under additional information.
